<line: 15> FRANKLIN TENNIS, et. al.

[TITLE]
<line: 17> ORDER

[TEXT]
<line: 19> AND NOW, this 18th day of May 2006, upon consideration of the Petitioner Bassanio
<line: 20> Sterling’s Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus (Doc. No.1), and after careful review of the Report
<line: 21> and Recommendation of United States Magistrate Judge David R. Strawbridge (Doc. No. 18) and
<line: 22> Petitioner’s objections thereto (Doc. No. 21), it is hereby ORDERED that:

[TEXT]
<line: 24>             1.  The Report and Recommendation is APPROVED and Adopted.
<line: 25>             2.  The Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus is DENIED.
<line: 26>             3.  The Clerk of Court is directed to close this matter for statistical purposes.

[TEXT]
<line: 28> BY THE COURT:
<line: 29> /S/LEGROME D. DAVIS
<line: 30> LEGROME D. DAVIS, J
